text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I like, wanted to do something with you today?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: "Do something"…?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Yeah, nails～!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Ee… eh!?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, the manager here is totes cool with it. He told me 
it's 'kay to do my nails as long as it doesn't smell much.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: So like, what color do you want? Maybe a lively pink?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: I like pink, but… I mean, why…?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
… 
… Well, y'know—?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You looked under the weather this whole time. But I couldn't 
think of what to say. Like, what if I hurt you? Y'know?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
… 'sides, I suck at that. Like, encouraging people. 
I'm dumb and awkward with words and all. Particularly 
with you nice kids, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I tried before y'know, to cheer her up a girl in my class, and bombed 
it. She told me "I can't just 'cheer up' like that."

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But the other kids encouraged her, and she felt better right 
away. Like, I'm sorry, I don't know what to do?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: But, still… I wanted to cheer up like everyone else, you know?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … Ms. Jordan…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
… But like at school, everyone's different, right? So do I really 
need to be so well spoken? I'm fine just being myself, right?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
So I figured… let's just paint something 
exciting! So yeah, gimme your hand!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text:
Tha… thank you so much…! I didn't 
realize you were thinking of me so much…!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … I'm sorry I didn't notice…

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Oh it's cool, don't mind me.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
How do I say… If I'm not useless being an idiot, why would you be 
useless just because you're small?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Being different's like, whatever? There's nothing wrong 
with that. There's things only you can do too, right, Flower?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Right?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … Yes!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Heh. If there's anything I can do, I'm here. Just tell me.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … Well, then… can I ask you about one thing? Umm…—

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Wah? Isn't that awesome!?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Re-really? Well, I'll try my best…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Munch, munch, gulp… Aaah, nothing beats 
hot pot in winter! —Oh, Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Bakushin O, Ms. Flash, excuse me for interrupting your lunch 
break. I have a request of Ms. Flash.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: How can I help you?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I would like some advice on my recipe. I'm trying 
to make "the best friend chocolate" — please have a look.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh! What a delight this would be!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Hehe, these macarons sure look delicious. Hmm, hmm, I see…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The key to macarons is macaronage. It is necessary 
to efficiently even out the air bubbles. So…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: —I see. Starting memory recording.
